name: jacita
description: 1. Create folder SCSS 2. Create main.scss  3. Install package.json - npm init 4. Intsall Sass - npm i node-sass  5. Add this in package.json file: "scripts": {     "RunSass": "node-sass -w scss/ -o dist/css/ --recursive"   }, 6. npm run RunSass
author: Gerhard Viljoen
